Public concern is growing about the accuracy of nutrition information on our beverages and snacks.

messages.content:
XYZ Corp Statement – December 9 2025

We have been made aware of ongoing investigations by the Federal Trade Commission, the California Department of Public Health, and a consumer watchdog regarding the labeling of some of our beverage and snack products. Our priority has always been to provide clear, accurate nutrition information to our customers.

We take these concerns very seriously. XYZ Corp is fully cooperating with all authorities and has already begun an internal review of our labeling practices. We are committed to correcting any discrepancies and to ensuring our labels meet—or exceed—all regulatory requirements.

To our valued customers and investors, we apologize for any confusion this may have caused. We will provide regular updates as we work toward a swift resolution and continue to uphold the highest standards of transparency and product safety.

Thank you for your trust.

— XYZ Corp Leadership Team
The draft statement is ready. I’ll run a quick legal review to confirm there are no liability issues before publication.
